name: Galactic Tax Officer
text: Supreme overlord {user}, I suggest we increase taxes on the population.

options.text: Sure, we have many more great projects to fund in the future.
No, that will lead to a dissatisfied population.
options.reaction: You are right, we need to let people get back on their feet.

name: Angry Citizen
text: We, the working duck, are living hand to beak. Taxes are making it increasingly difficult to survive in this galaxy. We have families, Lord {user}..

options.text: You have convinced me, I shall ease the burden.
options.reaction: Thank you, my lord. You have restored my hope for the future.
You need to understand, king! You will squeeze us dry and leave us to rot.

name: Shady Merchant
text: Overlord, I can sell you rare artifacts from distant worlds. It may make your citizens happier.

options.reaction: A pleasure doing business, overlord. These trinkets will dazzle your court.

options.text: Refuse. This smells like a scam.
options.reaction: Tch. You wound me, my lord. May your vault never know true wonder.

name: Fate Mage
text: Overlord... care to take a gamble with the currents of fate?

options.text: Yes. I welcome fortune or ruin.
options.reaction: Excellent. The void stirs. Let us see who it favors today.

options.text: Nah, I’ll just hope for good duck.
options.reaction: Caution is a cage and a shield, overlord. The void will wait for another day.

name: Bounty Huntress
text: Overlord, a criminal wreaks havoc on your subjects. Pay me, and I will hunt them down.

options.text: Hire her to hunt the criminal.
options.reaction: Your quarry is mine, my lord. I will bring you news one way or another.
Then your people will bleed in the streets, not on my blade. Remember that choice.

name: Witch
text: For a small offering, I will peer into the mood of your subjects.

options.text: Since you’re so seducktive I’ll pay you.
options.reaction: The veil parts for those who pay the price. Listen carefully to what I reveal next.

options.text: How about you kiss my buttquack
options.reaction: Then walk blind among storms, overlord. The fates will not soften your fall.

name: Imperial Tax Collector
text: Lord {user}, your citizens have paid their taxes. These funds are now yours.

name: Refugee Fleet
text: Lord {user}, a fleet of displaced aliens seeks shelter in your territory.

options.reaction: We are in your debt. Your name will be sung with praises for eternity.

options.text: Turn them away at the border.
options.reaction: Please... no. Our children. The fleet turns away, and hatred follows in its wake.
